# Sample PDFs for tests

These PDFs are from the [Mozilla pdf.js test suite](https://github.com/mozilla/pdf.js/tree/master/test/pdfs) (free, open-source test assets).

To refresh or add more:

```bash
./scripts/download-pdf-testdata.sh test/testdata/pdfs
```

To use a different destination:

```bash
./scripts/download-pdf-testdata.sh /path/to/dir
```
